00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : MPI_UpdateRho
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00031 
00032  SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateRho
00033 
00034 ! Common Variables
00035  USE Domain
00036  USE FluidParams, ONLY : rho
00037  USE MPIParams
00038  USE MPI
00039  IMPLICIT NONE
00040 
00041 ! Local Variables
00042  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00043  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00044  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00045 
00046 !--------- Save data from real nodes -------------------------------------------
00047 ! X DIRECTION
00048  count = 1
00049  DO j = yl, yu
00050    rho_west_snd(count)     = rho(xl  ,j)
00051    rho_west_snd(count + 1) = rho(xl+1,j)
00052    rho_west_snd(count + 2) = rho(xl+2,j)
00053    rho_east_snd(count)     = rho(xu  ,j)
00054    rho_east_snd(count + 1) = rho(xu-1,j)
00055    rho_east_snd(count + 2) = rho(xu-2,j)
00056    count = count + 3
00057  END DO
00058 
00059 ! Y DIRECTION
00060  count = 1
00061  DO i = xl, xu
00062    rho_south_snd(count)     = rho(i,yl  )
00063    rho_south_snd(count + 1) = rho(i,yl+1)
00064    rho_south_snd(count + 2) = rho(i,yl+2)
00065    rho_north_snd(count)     = rho(i,yu  )
00066    rho_north_snd(count + 1) = rho(i,yu-1)
00067    rho_north_snd(count + 2) = rho(i,yu-2)
00068    count = count + 3
00069  END DO
00070 
00071 ! NE DIAGONAL
00072  rho_ne_snd(1) = rho(xu  ,yu  )
00073  rho_ne_snd(2) = rho(xu-1,yu  )
00074  rho_ne_snd(3) = rho(xu-2,yu  )
00075  rho_ne_snd(4) = rho(xu  ,yu-1)
00076  rho_ne_snd(5) = rho(xu-1,yu-1)
00077  rho_ne_snd(6) = rho(xu-2,yu-1)
00078  rho_ne_snd(7) = rho(xu  ,yu-2)
00079  rho_ne_snd(8) = rho(xu-1,yu-2)
00080  rho_ne_snd(9) = rho(xu-2,yu-2)
00081  
00082 ! NW DIAGONAL
00083  rho_nw_snd(1) = rho(xl  ,yu  )
00084  rho_nw_snd(2) = rho(xl+1,yu  )
00085  rho_nw_snd(3) = rho(xl+2,yu  )
00086  rho_nw_snd(4) = rho(xl  ,yu-1)
00087  rho_nw_snd(5) = rho(xl+1,yu-1)
00088  rho_nw_snd(6) = rho(xl+2,yu-1)
00089  rho_nw_snd(7) = rho(xl  ,yu-2)
00090  rho_nw_snd(8) = rho(xl+1,yu-2)
00091  rho_nw_snd(9) = rho(xl+2,yu-2)
00092 
00093 ! SW DIAGONAL
00094  rho_sw_snd(1) = rho(xl  ,yl  )
00095  rho_sw_snd(2) = rho(xl+1,yl  )
00096  rho_sw_snd(3) = rho(xl+2,yl  )
00097  rho_sw_snd(4) = rho(xl  ,yl+1)
00098  rho_sw_snd(5) = rho(xl+1,yl+1)
00099  rho_sw_snd(6) = rho(xl+2,yl+1)
00100  rho_sw_snd(7) = rho(xl  ,yl+2)
00101  rho_sw_snd(8) = rho(xl+1,yl+2)
00102  rho_sw_snd(9) = rho(xl+2,yl+2)
00103 
00104 ! SE DIAGONAL 
00105  rho_se_snd(1) = rho(xu  ,yl  ) 
00106  rho_se_snd(2) = rho(xu-1,yl  )
00107  rho_se_snd(3) = rho(xu-2,yl  )
00108  rho_se_snd(4) = rho(xu  ,yl+1) 
00109  rho_se_snd(5) = rho(xu-1,yl+1)
00110  rho_se_snd(6) = rho(xu-2,yl+1)
00111  rho_se_snd(7) = rho(xu  ,yl+2) 
00112  rho_se_snd(8) = rho(xu-1,yl+2)
00113  rho_se_snd(9) = rho(xu-2,yl+2)
00114 
00115  
00116 !--------- Exchange information using MPI calls --------------------------------
00117 ! X DIRECTION
00118  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_east_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00119  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_west_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00120  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00121 
00122  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_west_rcv, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00123  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_east_snd, xsize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00124  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00125 
00126 ! Y DIRECTION
00127  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_north_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00128  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_south_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00129  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00130 
00131  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_south_rcv, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00132  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_north_snd, ysize3, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00133  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00134 
00135 ! DIAGONALS
00136  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_ne_rcv, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00137  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_sw_snd, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00138  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00139 
00140  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_nw_rcv, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00141  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_se_snd, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00142  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00143 
00144  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_se_rcv, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00145  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_nw_snd, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG3, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00146  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00147 
00148  CALL MPI_IRECV(rho_sw_rcv, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00149  CALL MPI_SEND( rho_ne_snd, 9, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG4, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00150  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00151  
00152 
00153 !---------  Update the density rho in the three ghost layers -------------------
00154 ! X DIRECTION
00155  count = 1
00156  DO j = yl, yu
00157    rho(xug ,j) = rho_east_rcv(count)
00158    rho(xug2,j) = rho_east_rcv(count + 1)
00159    rho(xug3,j) = rho_east_rcv(count + 2)
00160    rho(xlg ,j) = rho_west_rcv(count)
00161    rho(xlg2,j) = rho_west_rcv(count + 1)
00162    rho(xlg3,j) = rho_west_rcv(count + 2)
00163    count = count + 3
00164  END DO
00165 
00166 ! Y DIRECTION
00167  count = 1
00168  DO i = xl, xu
00169    rho(i,yug ) = rho_north_rcv(count)
00170    rho(i,yug2) = rho_north_rcv(count + 1)
00171    rho(i,yug3) = rho_north_rcv(count + 2)
00172    rho(i,ylg ) = rho_south_rcv(count)
00173    rho(i,ylg2) = rho_south_rcv(count + 1)
00174    rho(i,ylg3) = rho_south_rcv(count + 2)
00175    count = count + 3
00176  END DO
00177 
00178 ! NE DIAGONAL
00179  rho(xug ,yug ) = rho_ne_rcv(1)
00180  rho(xug2,yug ) = rho_ne_rcv(2)
00181  rho(xug3,yug ) = rho_ne_rcv(3)
00182  rho(xug ,yug2) = rho_ne_rcv(4)
00183  rho(xug2,yug2) = rho_ne_rcv(5)
00184  rho(xug3,yug2) = rho_ne_rcv(6)
00185  rho(xug ,yug3) = rho_ne_rcv(7)
00186  rho(xug2,yug3) = rho_ne_rcv(8)
00187  rho(xug3,yug3) = rho_ne_rcv(9)
00188 
00189 ! NW DIAGONAL 
00190  rho(xlg ,yug ) = rho_nw_rcv(1)
00191  rho(xlg2,yug ) = rho_nw_rcv(2)
00192  rho(xlg3,yug ) = rho_nw_rcv(3)
00193  rho(xlg ,yug2) = rho_nw_rcv(4)
00194  rho(xlg2,yug2) = rho_nw_rcv(5)
00195  rho(xlg3,yug2) = rho_nw_rcv(6)
00196  rho(xlg ,yug3) = rho_nw_rcv(7)
00197  rho(xlg2,yug3) = rho_nw_rcv(8)
00198  rho(xlg3,yug3) = rho_nw_rcv(9)
00199 
00200 ! SW DIAGONAL 
00201  rho(xlg ,ylg ) = rho_sw_rcv(1)
00202  rho(xlg2,ylg ) = rho_sw_rcv(2)
00203  rho(xlg3,ylg ) = rho_sw_rcv(3)
00204  rho(xlg ,ylg2) = rho_sw_rcv(4)
00205  rho(xlg2,ylg2) = rho_sw_rcv(5)
00206  rho(xlg3,ylg2) = rho_sw_rcv(6)
00207  rho(xlg ,ylg3) = rho_sw_rcv(7)
00208  rho(xlg2,ylg3) = rho_sw_rcv(8)
00209  rho(xlg3,ylg3) = rho_sw_rcv(9)
00210 
00211 ! SE DIAGONAL
00212  rho(xug ,ylg ) = rho_se_rcv(1)
00213  rho(xug2,ylg ) = rho_se_rcv(2)
00214  rho(xug3,ylg ) = rho_se_rcv(3)
00215  rho(xug ,ylg2) = rho_se_rcv(4)
00216  rho(xug2,ylg2) = rho_se_rcv(5)
00217  rho(xug3,ylg2) = rho_se_rcv(6)
00218  rho(xug ,ylg3) = rho_se_rcv(7)
00219  rho(xug2,ylg3) = rho_se_rcv(8)
00220  rho(xug3,ylg3) = rho_se_rcv(9)
00221 
00222  RETURN
00223  END SUBROUTINE MPI_UpdateRho
